name: TLG Motel (Pre-Alpha)
description:
There's somethin that isn't right about this motel

You felt your life all counting on this momment for no reasons. Is the truth will be uncovered? Or you will be like the others...

A very early RPG game Im working on. Still many things to improve, since it;s still in Pre-Alpha.

There's a bug with a camera where if you go upstair and refuse at the beginning, the camera will stuct, so be aware.

Controls:

AWSD To Move

E To Confirm

Q To Cancel

Mouse To Look Around
